PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-06012023-06-22VAC
ActVeterans Review and Appeal Board Act
PrecisReappointment of CHRISTOPHER J. MCNEIL of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a permanent member of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and his designation as Chairperson, effective July 2, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Veterans Review and Appeal Board Act
precis: Reappointment of CHRISTOPHER J. MCNEIL of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a permanent member of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and his designation as Chairperson, effective July 2, 2023.
